overview:
AJ Shanley, Chief Operating Officer and Vice President of Business Development, is responsible for key technology partnerships, channel partnerships and corporate integration strategy.

Prior to TrialPay, AJ was a Director at Symantec Corporation, where he held positions in Marketing and Corporate and Business Development. Earlier in his career AJ worked in private equity for BancBoston Capital (now part of Bank of America) and as an investment banking analyst for Robertson, Stephens & Company.

AJ holds a BA in Economics from Swarthmore College and an MBA from Harvard Business School.
